channel.title: Simplicity 1.0 - Build In The Image of Dodian
channel.description:
[ul][list][list][list][b][size=14pt]Simplicity[/size][/b]
[b]Base[/b]: RiotScape 1.0 [b]Networking[/b]: Mina 2.0, I was going to use netty but meh.
[b]Combat EXP[/b]: Damage * 90 [b]Skilling EXP[/b]: RS'S EXP rates * 4 (Using RS wiki ofcourse)
Work I've released recently: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,510774.0.html
[b]Introduction[/b] I'm rather tired of the current server communities that's running now-a-days, they're all the same they're all complete trash. It seem that every server you find on the toplists are complete trash, with a few exception such as Emps-Scape, Epicurus-RSPS(They're not that great however the main programmer knows what he's doing), BattleScape, maybe more? And they all seem to be cramming their client with 602+ data, which looks utterly shit if you ask me, atleast on a 317 client. My server is build in the image of Dodian, it was one legendary server, the only thing that was wrong with dodian was that it was poorly programmed, but the content itself and the gameplay was rather amazing. I wouldn't call myself great at Java, however I know my ways around Java and has more than enough knowledge to pull off an amazing server with great content.
[b]Features[/b] [list] [li]Potion Making[/li] [li]Herb Identifying[/li] [li]Hide Crafting[/li] [li]Cooking(Only works on ranges for now)[/li] [li]Prayer[/li][/list] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/k16jcn.png[/img] [list][li]Fishing[/li][/list] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/k3unts.png[/img] [list][li]Fletching[/li][/list] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/be644k.gif[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/10yg95l.gif[/img] [/list]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/28vc4rn.gif[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/vo1kqc.gif[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/15hnddu.gif[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/34fglqv.gif[/img][/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: Simplicity 1.0 - Build In The Image of Dodian
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:21, topic:409721”][quote author=TimeTM link=topic=510997.msg3708348#msg3708348 date=1313184618]

GJ nice work on the bow stringing. Maybe in the future you can make a option to loop it by clicking an X option? Anyway it’s cool though like it a lot.

Correct me if I’m wrong, but I’m pretty sure you couldn’t do that in the 317 era.

Why don’t you add conventions and stuff to the code? Like what each number represents unless you have amazing memory and remember?

OT: Awesome development, this development might be the most successful.

My brain is a super computer, and thanks.
[/quote]
Fair enough, good luck with the development then. Guessing this would never be released?[/quote]

Probably not, it’s going to be hosted though.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

reyx7:

Fucking love dodian. Goodluck.

Thanks! Just finished fletching(Cutting logs), I store the data in an array.

	private final static int LOG_DATA[][] = {
		//Logs
		{1511, 48, 1, 10, 10},
		{1511, 50, 1, 5, 5},
		{1511, 52, 15, 5, 1},
		//Oak
		{1521, 54, 1, 16, 20},
		{1521, 56, 1, 25, 25}, 
		//Maple
		{1517, 62, 1, 58, 55},
		{1517, 64, 1, 50, 50},
		//Willow Logs
		{1519, 58, 1, 41, 40},
		{1519, 60, 1, 33, 35},
		//Yew
		{1515, 66, 1, 70, 75},
		{1515, 68, 1, 67, 65},
		//Magic
		{1513, 70, 1, 91, 85},
		{1513, 72, 1, 83, 80},
	};

item.title: Simplicity 1.0 - Build In The Image of Dodian
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[ul][list][list][list][size=14pt]Simplicity[/size]

Base: RiotScape 1.0
Networking: Mina 2.0, I was going to use netty but meh.

Combat EXP: Damage * 90
Skilling EXP: RS’S EXP rates * 4 (Using RS wiki ofcourse)

Work I’ve released recently: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,510774.0.html

Introduction
I’m rather tired of the current server communities that’s running now-a-days, they’re all the same they’re all complete trash. It seem that every server you find on the toplists are complete trash, with a few exception such as Emps-Scape, Epicurus-RSPS(They’re not that great however the main programmer knows what he’s doing), BattleScape, maybe more? And they all seem to be cramming their client with 602+ data, which looks utterly shit if you ask me, atleast on a 317 client. My server is build in the image of Dodian, it was one legendary server, the only thing that was wrong with dodian was that it was poorly programmed, but the content itself and the gameplay was rather amazing. I wouldn’t call myself great at Java, however I know my ways around Java and has more than enough knowledge to pull off an amazing server with great content.

Features
[list]
[li]Potion Making[/li]
[li]Herb Identifying[/li]
[li]Hide Crafting[/li]
[li]Cooking(Only works on ranges for now)[/li]
[li]Prayer[/li][/list]

k16jcn.png758×498

[list][li]Fishing[/li][/list]
k3unts.png757×496

[list][li]Fletching[/li][/list]


[/list]




[/list][/list][/ul]
